articles.author: Sydney Bishop, Jose Alvarez
articles.title: A US man died after being electrocuted in a hot tub in Mexican resort town, authorities say - CNN
articles.description: A 43-year-old American man died after he and another US national were electrocuted while in a jacuzzi at a complex of private condominiums in Puerto Peñasco, Mexico, authorities said.
articles.content:
A 43-year-old American man died after he and another US national were electrocuted while in a jacuzzi at a complex of private condominiums in Puerto Peñasco, Mexico, authorities said.
